ygData.subject: Mutiny to Megatron!
ygData.msgSnippet: Starscream Starscream got out of the pond, transformed and went over to Dollen. Hey, thanks for the vote, but Phobia s got command. And you gotta settle down.

Starscream

Starscream got out of the pond, transformed and went over to Dollen.

"Hey, thanks for the vote, but Phobia's got command. And you gotta 
settle down. This isn't permanent. It's just until KitKat gets 
repaired and we confront that bastard Megatron." Starscream looked 
around and gave a speech.

"Now, I know I'm not in command, but I've got something to say. We 
all know where Meagtron is. Off somewhere with the other Preds, 
trying to unify all of us into a super group. He's been spending all 
his time with the others, while his loyal subjets he abandoned! He 
ran away, and left us to die by the hands of the Maximals! Going with 
Tarantulas will only play right into Megatron's hands, as if we 
forget him not fighting with us. So Phobia, this is your choice, but 
I plead with you. Take the Alliance help. Let us all turn our backs 
against Megatron. What has he got us? A blown up base. A destroyed 
spaceship. KitKat near death! Let us make our own base. Make an 
Alliance, with the Alliance. Beat Megatron to pods. Strenghten 
ourselves under KitKat, and never forgive him for what he has done! 
We have been fighting amongst ourselves. Four of us have already 
abandoned the group! If we go back to him, he'll take it as a sign 
that we don't care, and make us the low ranks. For the sake of all of 
us, let us go with the Alliance."
